programme.title: Washington Week
programme.desc: The panelists discuss the passing of Colin Powell, a former chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff, secretary of state and national security adviser. Plus, the ongoing battle in Congress over voting rights.

programme.desc: Chef Pati Jinich travels from Laredo and Nuevo Laredo to Brownsville, Texas. She learns how tight-knit family bonds are an underlying theme connecting everything in the Laredos and throughout La Frontera.
